Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 2.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 1.0+

```
init(_ value: CGFloat)
```

### [Converting Floating-Point Values](/documentation/Swift/Int/init(_:)-5q6q5#Converting-Floating-Point-Values)

[`init<T>(T)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-6gt9z)[`init(Double)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-8vbwo)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-2oscb)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float16)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-3huv0)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.[`init(Float80)`](/documentation/swift/int/init(_:)-66i0w)Creates an integer from the given floating-point value, rounding toward zero.
